Reviews.Title: Excellent bundle for a photography rookie like me!
Reviews.Author: H. Rivera
Reviews.Content: I just bought this bundle with the purpose of introducing photography as a new hobby in my life.  I have to mention that this bundle delivered all the required basics (maybe a little more than I needed) to start from scratch with a DSLR camera.  I love the fact that I got variety of lenses and filters that I can utilize to develop my photography skills.  So far, I'm loving this bundle and I believe this an excellent option for any person considering entering the DSLR world.  The bundle was well packaged by the seller.**Please note that even the Rebel T5i is a great camera this review is more for the bundle than the camera itself.
